StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_AddProgramAvailability]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProgramID int, @FiscalYear int, @PeriodCode int, @Organiza.onID int, @Quan.ty int, @QtyRemovedShipProg int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @ProgramPeriodID int
SELECT @ProgramPeriodID = PROGRAM_PERIOD_ID FROM PROGRAM_PERIOD WHERE FY = @FiscalYear AND PERIOD_CODE = @PeriodCode
--- CREATE THE TEMP TABLE CREATE TABLE #TEMP_TABLE (TEMP_ID INT)
--- POPULATE THE TEMP TABLE INSERT INTO #TEMP_TABLE (TEMP_ID) EXEC sp_CreateTempTable @NumberOfRows = @Quan.ty
--- INSERT THE PROGRAM AVAILABILITY RECORDS INSERT INTO PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY (PROGRAM_ID, ASSIGNED_ORGANIZATION_ID, PROGRAM_PERIOD_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) SELECT @ProgramID, @Organiza.onID, @ProgramPeriodID, @UserLogin, GETDATE() FROM #TEMP_TABLE
--- UPDATE REMOVED SHIPPER PROGRAM AMOUNT --- User RowCount since a value cannot be sent to TOP IF @QtyRemovedShipProg > 0 BEGIN SET ROWCOUNT @QtyRemovedShipProg
DELETE REMOVED_PROGRAMS FROM REMOVED_PROGRAMS INNER JOIN PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA ON (REMOVED_PROGRAMS.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID = PA.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID) INNER JOIN PROGRAM ON (PROGRAM.PROGRAM_ID = PA.PROGRAM_ID) INNER JOIN PROGRAM_PERIOD PP ON (PA.PROGRAM_PERIOD_ID = PP.PROGRAM_PERIOD_ID AND PP.FY = @FiscalYear) WHERE PROGRAM.PROGRAM_ID = @ProgramID
SET ROWCOUNT 0 END
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #TEMP_TABLE SET NOCOUNT OFF
